subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins rookie Evgeni Malkin scored a goal in his first N.H.L. game, but Jamie Langenbrunner’s third-period goal gave the Devils a 2-1 victory last night at Continental Arena.
snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins rookie Evgeni Malkin scored a goal in his first N.H.L. game, but Jamie Langenbrunner’s third-period goal gave the Devils a 2-1 victory last night at Continental Arena.
